original_title: China Merchants, Sinopec teams seeking Sri Lanka investments: embassy
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Delegations from China Merchants and Sinopec groups are in Sri Lanka looking for further investments in the island, the Chinese embassy in Colombo said.
China Merchants group in already operating a port and industrial park in Hambantota and a container terminal in Colombo.

Top delegations from the Sinopec Group (Ranking 5th in the Fortune Global 500 list of 2022) and the China Merchants Group (152nd) are currently visiting Sri Lanka to enhance cooperation and further investment on petroleum & chemicals, trade, and port & industrial park operation. pic.twitter.com/oMJIrvTBgw

Top delegations from the Sinopec Group (Ranking 5th in the Fortune Global 500 list of 2022) and the China Merchants Group (152nd) are currently visiting Sri Lanka to enhance cooperation and further investment on petroleum & chemicals, trade, and port & industrial park operation.
Sri Lanka is currently seeking to re-structure and get investment into its petroleum utility. (Colombo/ Mar 12/2023)
